column2: # -- extract the PANSS scores at time.onset.TRS : this will be the baseline for symptom change measurement
baselinePANSS <- temp[ which( temp$visday == time.onset.TRS ), c("visday", "adjPos", "adjNeg", "adjGen", "adjTot") ]
